document_data.name: Sap
document_data.mainbody: A '''sap''', also called a '''blackjack''', was a type of light, nonlethal melee weapon used for knocking people unconscious.
document_data.Description:
A sap was filled with lead shot (small pellets), [[sand]], or a similar material.

They weighed about {{SI|2|lb|long=yes}}.
document_data.Weaponology: Saps were designed to deliver non-killing blows, usually to knock someone unconscious.
document_data.Varieties: * Truncheon: A heavier version of the standard sap.

Notable Users.Individuals:
* [[Alak Abaeir]]
* [[Lepidius Tragemandes]]
* [[Yalister Ikhusaru]] was proficient in the use of saps.<ref>
Notable Users.Races & Intelligent Creatures: * [[Kenku]] were often known to wield saps.
Notable Users.Regions & Settlements: * In the land of [[Sembia]], saps were a signature weapon of [[thieves]] in the city of [[Daerlun]].
